meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

meanings.meaning: Once a use, forever a custom.

vlive.korean: 그래서 막 공통점은 그냥 두 손을 쓴다는 거? So, their common ground is the fact that they use two hands? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: So, their common ground is the fact that they use two hands?

vlive.korean: 공통점은 그냥 두 손을 쓴다는 거? - 으응... So, their common ground is the fact that they use two hands? - Hmm. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 🎼툽깅이와 함께라면 클래식도 늘 새롭고 짜릿해❣️(SOOBIN&YEONJUN eating Jokbal and Makguksu)
vlive.english: So, their common ground is the fact that they use two hands? - Hmm.

vlive.korean: 나 그거 안 쓴다는 거... 쿠션! I didn't use it before ... the cushion! 듣기 View video V Beauty : 3.여배우 유인나가 욕심 내서 만든 #유인나컬렉션 #허니커버렛

vlive.korean: "언니 옷에 5만 원 이상 안 쓴다는 루머가 있는데 사실인가요?" "There's a rumor that you don't spend more than 50,000 won on clothes. Is that true?" 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [#WJSN][우주소녀] 엑시 깜짝 등장👻
vlive.english: "There's a rumor that you don't spend more than 50,000 won on clothes. Is that true?"

vlive.korean: [인싸들만 한다는 바로 그걸.. 우리 형이 하네] - 인싸들만 쓴다는 - 이게 된다고? [He's using the trendy item] - This is used by trendy ones. - Is this working? 듣기 View video YG 보석함 (YG TREASURE BOX) : YG보석함ㅣCHRISTMAS PARTY
vlive.english: [He's using the trendy item] - This is used by trendy ones. - Is this working?

examples.korean: The idea of sharing a room appalled her. 발음듣기 방을 같이 쓴다는 생각만 해도 그녀는 끔찍했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The idea of sharing a room appalled her. 발음

examples.korean: The government is accused of using delaying tactics. 발음듣기 정부가 지연작전을 쓴다는 비난을 듣고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government is accused of using delaying tactics. 발음

examples.korean: Even I boggle at the idea of spending so much money. 발음듣기 심지어 나도 그렇게 많은 돈을 쓴다는 생각에는 주춤해진다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Even I boggle at the idea of spending so much money. 발음

examples.korean: It’s obscene to spend so much on food when millions are starving. 발음듣기 수백만 명의 사람들이 굶주리고 있는데 음식에 그처럼 많은 돈을 쓴다는 것은 가당찮은 짓이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s obscene to spend so much on food when millions are starving. 발음

examples.korean: Once a use, forever a custom. 발음듣기 한번 쓴다는 것이 습관이 된다. (서양속담, 습관속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Once a use, forever a custom. 발음
